Catalog.ResourceDescription.Name: crisma-openlayers
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Author: Manuel Warum
Catalog.ResourceDescription.Description: Basic OpenLayers widget using OpenStreetMap tiles. Data, imagery and map information provided by OpenStreetMap and contributors, CC-BY-SA

InputEndpoint.name: view_point
InputEndpoint.label: Coordinates
InputEndpoint.description: Focuses the map on specified coordinates

InputEndpoint.name: add_point
InputEndpoint.label: Add point
InputEndpoint.description: Adds a point to the map

InputEndpoint.name: add_poly
InputEndpoint.label: Add polygon
InputEndpoint.description: Adds a polygon to the map

InputEndpoint.name: clear
InputEndpoint.label: Clear
InputEndpoint.description: Removes all features from the map (points and polygons)

OutputEndpoint.name: center_point
OutputEndpoint.label: Coordinates
OutputEndpoint.description: Sends a signal whenever the shown center changes
